ModMetadata.Name: Inventory Window Fix [StationeersMods]
ModMetadata.Author: tom_is_unlucky
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Inventory Window Fix[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://jixxed.github.io/StationeersMods/
Fixes inventory window saving to properly save positions of nested container windows. Also fixes the extra space between docked windows when closing a window in the middle.
